title: Intel i9-9980XE Review - ANOTHER Skylake Refresh?
description: The Intel i9-9980XE is an expensive processor that's supposed to perform well in benchmarks against the AMD Threadripper 2 2950X.  But at $2000 its VERY hard to recommend.    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Threadripper 2950X:   Thermaltake Riing Trio:   G.Skill Trident Z:   X299 STRIX-E:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Intel. This video is sponsored by Thermaltake. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #9980xe i99980xe i9-9980xe #hardwarecanucks
